The writer More opportunities today
America than before in the business field There small
being made by and who have the forewgh and
willingness strike their


travelled in of the the nation and have been
lack of businesses owned organized by Negroes
Negroes dry cleaning plants shoe repair
shops bakeries There trend Negroes the
small business beauty barber shops There


other which have been tried by Negroes who
might be able find the door open.


Recently Negroes entered the real and some have
made substantially good earnings. In most cities however sales
reduced because Of all negbor
hoods.


Builders have been vore for Negro
few have entered the financing end Of home
buying construction.


Many civil rights organizations receive thousands OF dol
often much Is spent by
who travel the length and bredh Of the nation
making speeches.


Some Of the Urban League NAACP. CORE and
Leadership Conference could be invested
by providing scholarships helping finance
business for American Negroes.

Edward Banks

pre-scheduled tax bill when we
are born. AS the wee babes leave
the hospitals their bax bills will
accompany them. All they will
have to do is send in a check
or money order out of coupon
book monthly until they depart

from this we'll taxed earth.


If you have forgotten to doyour
good deed for the week. Call
your local income tax department
and wish them a Merry Christ
mas. Remind him it will take that
long for you to recoup from this
years tax bill.

pain when ! mailed those long
envelopes addressed to the fed
eral and state income tax d.
visions. Enclosed In those folders
we're the accumulated hours Of
grinding my teeth, banging on the
adding machine. figuring on var
ious pads and erasing errors.


For the past two years was
caught in the late minute mad
ness and rushed to the main post
office on the stroke Of midnight
with envelopes clutched in my
tired fingers. My husband would
drive around the streets because
no parking or alighting room was
nearby either entrance to the post
office building.


Last year automobiles we're
lined two blocks from the nearest
mailbox and hundreds of citizens
raced to and fro in the down.
town streets trying to beat the
midnight deadline.


This year promised myself
would not be caught in the
hectic rush. l prepared prelimi-
nary forms and did stacks Of
worksheets before | completed
the forms. Each year more and
more items are changed. added or
deleted.


Weary taxpayers who are ma
turally tired from their jobs
must find energy to wrestle with
income tax forms. Many take
their woes to others who prepare
them. But l prefer to do ours.


After all you work SO hard to
earn your wages--why not work
harder to figure out ways Of pay
ing taxes. am sure you have
had some unkind words for the
tax collectors. There is only
one bit of cons olation | can offer.
Remember, tax collectors must
also meet the tax collectors.


No one is positive when and
how the scourge Of manhnd--
taxes began. Some alert ruler fig
ured a way to keep his Golfers
full by simply assessing one
piece Of gold. one ounce of salt
or one blanket of fur from his
subjects.


Empires rose and fell but taxes
have remained. Caesars. tsars,
cars, despots. dictators, bene-
VIOLENT monarchs. queens, kings
and all kinds Of rulers have
managed to exercise a common
stranglehold on the people-taxes.


In our modern world the word
tax Is heard so often that small
children accept 1t as a part OF
their vocabulary. We pay gaso-
line, whiskey, cigarette, sales,
cosmetic. excise. gross income,
property. water use, entertain
ment, inventory and telephone
taxes.


Women suffer the worst type of
ridiculous taxation. We must pay
taxes called luxury taxes on items
of keeping our faces lovely. We
must pay luxury taxes on hand
bags. How could the taxmen think
we could exist without handbag7
They are necessities not notions.


We have taxes surrounding us
on every side. There are national
taxes, state taxes, county taxes,
and city taxes. l am sure some
shrewd government official is de-
vising ways Of trapping US in
smaller street bounds and charge
us neighborhood or block taxes.


In this move toward mass auto
nation l believe the federal gov
eminent is pulling our legs by
saying only portion Of our tax
returns will be scrutinized. With
computers and cooling devices |
am sure every man. woman and

President Lyndon johnson has appointed
Sargent ShYiUeY, the former head Of the Peace
Corps, as the head Of the newly formed fed
eYal anti poverty bureau.


r For many years U0TiOuS types of programs
aimed at hating poverty among the urlf0Ttu-
nate people in the United States haze been
operating. Perhaps, the administration would
prefer that ne overlook the fact that millions
of citizens are receiving educational training,
welfare assistance, food Yati0ns and other
kinds Of aid as part Of an overall program
designed to help those WhO can not help them
selves.


We should not believe that q separate diUi-
sion of the federal government OiU end the
areas where poverty occurs. Poverty is an
economic condition caused by unequal edu-
cation and job opportunities.


Surveys prove that Negroes comprise
great percent of those wh0 are classified as
poverty stricken. Their color of skin has
caused them to remain in the lowest S0ciO-
economic conditions.


Also in the large group Of poverty stricken
beoble are those whites Who hve in the hin
and mountain areas Of the Abba la chan and
Ozark Mountains. Their color Of skin can
not be blamed rather their inability to find
jobs near their homes caused their plight.
Efforts to organize another program to
he lp the poverty stricken areas and citizens
must begin first with the people. Instead Of
luagi,lg the uUay on poverty with endless de-
baytments and htleS-H might be WeH to b0l-
stey the federal and state naanb0wer train
ing programs and housing facilities.


Perhaps Mn. ShyiUeY can see the talMcy IN
sending so many dedicated people to help
raise the standards of hvirlg in foreign co1n-
tries when there is such a great need here
in our OuVn land.
